tit.j: 京都国立博物館所蔵文化財一覧
tit.e: The List of Kyoto National Museum Collections of Cultural Asset
List of Cultural Properties Held by Kyoto National Museum
tit.cmt: 文法を修正して書き直し
tit.e: List of Cultural Properties Held by Kyoto National Museum

sen.j: 京都国立博物館所蔵文化財一覧（きょうとこくりつはくぶつかんしょぞう ぶんかざいいちらん）
sen.e: The List of Kyoto National Museum Collections of Cultural Asset
List of Cultural Properties Held by Kyoto National Museum
sen.cmt: 文法を修正して書き直し
sen.e: List of Cultural Properties Held by Kyoto National Museum

sen.j: 本項は、京都国立博物館（京都市東山区茶屋町）所蔵品のうち、日本の文化財保護法に基づき国宝または重要文化財に指定されているものの一覧である。
sen.e: This section shows the list of the collection kept by the Kyoto National Museum (Chaya-machi, Higashiyama-ku, Kyoto), which inclusively contains the objects designated as national treasures or important cultural properties based on the Cultural Assets Preservation Act in Japan.
This article lists the items held by the Kyoto National Museum which have been designated National Treasures or Important Cultural Properties based on Japan's Cultural Assets Preservation Act.
sen.cmt: 原文を反映するように再翻訳
sen.e: This article lists the items held by the Kyoto National Museum which have been designated National Treasures or Important Cultural Properties based on Japan's Cultural Assets Preservation Act.

sen.j: （凡例）
sen.e: (Legend)
Legend
Legend

sen.j: 独立行政法人国立文化財機構所有・京都国立博物館保管の物件のみを収録対象とする。
sen.e: The works enlisted here are only those owned by the National Institutes for Cultural Heritage or those under the custody of the Kyoto National Museum.
The works enlisted here are only those owned by the National Institutes for Cultural Heritage or those under the custody of the Kyoto National Museum.
The works enlisted here are only those owned by the National Institutes for Cultural Heritage or those under the custody of the Kyoto National Museum.

sen.j: 社寺、個人所蔵家等から同博物館に寄託出品されている物件は含まない。
sen.e: The works that the museum keeps from the contributor, such as shrines and temples, or individual collectors, are not included in the list.
It does not include works from shrines, temples or private owners that are deposited or displayed at the museum.
sen.cmt: 原文を反映するとうに書き直し
sen.e: It does not include works from shrines, temples or private owners that are deposited or displayed at the museum.

sen.j: ○印は国宝を示し、無印は重要文化財である。
sen.e: The object title with ○ is a national treasure and that with no mark is an important cultural property.
Articles marked with a ○ are National Treasures and those with no mark are Important Cultural Properties.
Articles marked with a ○ are National Treasures and those with no mark are Important Cultural Properties.

sen.j: 本一覧における名称は国宝・重要文化財指定名称を基本としている。
sen.e: The titles used in this list are based on the denominations designated as national treasures and important cultural properties.
sen.cmt: （１）国宝・重要文化財指定名称(英文版）の存在が確認できませんでした。英文表記については表記の統一が取れている京都国立博物館収蔵品のデータベースに従いました。そのため、この説明「国宝・重要文化財指定名称を基本としている」と矛盾する可能性があります。（２）データベースアドレスの次に台帳番号を入れました。英＋漢字＋数字からなる台帳番号を記入した作品は、英文での登録がないことを示します。（３）また英文定訳なし（No English Title)としたものは、英文版作品登録がされていて英文名称が決められていない作品です。（４）日本語・英語ともに登録のない作品が数点あり、これらについては、その旨記したうえで、可能な限り和文(ローマ字表記）英文仮訳をつけました。
sen.e: The names used in this list are based on the name under which an article is designated as a National Treasure or Important Cultural Property.
sen.cmt: 原文を反映するように再翻訳
sen.e: The names used in this list are based on the name under which an article is designated as a National Treasure or Important Cultural Property.

sen.j: このため、博物館における展示説明、カタログ等で使用されている名称とは若干異なる場合もある。
sen.e: Therefore, there might be a slight difference in the title from those used in the explanations of exhibitions and catalogues.
sen.cmt: B列日本語作品名にC列の英文作品名は対応しています。収蔵品データベースで確認したものはE列（comment欄)に記しました。また特に断りのないものは、統一用語リストの訳語を使用しています。人名は特別の場合(コメントしました）を除き、統一用語規則に従い、名前・苗字(大文字)表記にしました。
sen.e: Therefore there may be slight differences between these names and the names used in museum exhibit explanations and catalogues.
sen.cmt: 原文を反映するように再翻訳
sen.e: Therefore there may be slight differences between these names and the names used in museum exhibit explanations and catalogues.

sen.j: 書状・記録類6巻（坂本龍馬関係書状類、海援隊日史等）、遺品類4点（血染掛軸、書画貼交屏風、三徳、黒羽二重紋服）
sen.e: Letters and Records, six volumes (Letters related with Ryoma SAKAMOTO and Record of Sakamoto Ryoma's Company Kaientai), and four relics (Hanging Scroll Paintings of Plum and Camellias Stained with the Blood of Sakamoto Ryoma, a folding screen decorated with Calligraphy and Painting Fragments, Tissue Pouch Used by Sakamoto Ryoma, and Formal Kimono with Family Crest (black habutae silk)).
sen.cmt: 海援隊日史→Record of Sakamoto Ryoma's Company Kaientai [データベースMK157-16] 血染掛軸 → Hanging Scroll Paintings of Plum and Camellias Stained with the Blood of Sakamoto Ryoma [データベースMK162] 書画貼交屏風 → folding screen decorated with Calligraphy and Painting Fragments [大文字部分はデータベースAK504] 三徳→Tissue Pouch Used by Sakamoto Ryoma [データベースMK161] 黒羽二重紋服→Formal Kimono with Family Crest (black habutae silk) [大文字部分はデータベースIK22].
sen.e: Letters and records, six volumes (letters related to Ryoma SAKAMOTO and records of his company Kaientai), and four relics (hanging scroll paintings of plums and camellias stained with the blood of Ryoma SAKAMOTO, a folding screen decorated with calligraphy and painting fragments, a tissue pouch used by Ryoma SAKAMOTO, and formal kimono with a family crest (black habutae silk)).
sen.cmt: ・大文字→小文字・「with」→「to」・「Record」→「records」・「Sakamoto Ryoma's」→「his」・「Plum」→「plums」・「Sakamoto Ryoma」→「Ryoma SAKAMOTO」（x2）・余計のスペースを削除・「a」を追加 （x2)
sen.e: Letters and records, six volumes (letters related to Ryoma SAKAMOTO and records of his company Kaientai), and four relics (hanging scroll paintings of plums and camellias stained with the blood of Ryoma SAKAMOTO, a folding screen decorated with calligraphy and painting fragments, a tissue pouch used by Ryoma SAKAMOTO, and formal kimono with a family crest (black habutae silk)).
